statutory_role: National electricity system and market operator for the NEM; power system security, dispatch and operational planning.
notes: National-level system operator (not a state TNSP).

statutory_role: Economic regulator for energy networks and market compliance/enforcement under national energy law (where applicable).

name_local: Department of Climate Change, Energy, the Environment and Water (DCCEEW)
name_english: Department of Climate Change, Energy, the Environment and Water (DCCEEW)
statutory_role: Commonwealth department responsible for national energy policy and programs (incl. sustainable energy).
Operates wholesale electricity market systems and market-related operational functions in the NEM.
notes: Same institution as TSO; retained due to distinct role.

statutory_role: Publishes the Integrated System Plan (ISP) for the NEM under the National Electricity Rules.
notes: Same institution as TSO; retained due to distinct role.

statutory_role: Government agency providing funding/support to accelerate renewable energy and related technologies.

name_local: Australian Radiation Protection and Nuclear Safety Agency (ARPANSA)
name_english: Australian Radiation Protection and Nuclear Safety Agency (ARPANSA)
statutory_role: Commonwealth regulator for radiation protection and nuclear safety (incl. licensing of relevant facilities).
notes: Australia has no operating nuclear power plants; ARPANSA regulates nuclear/radiation safety.

statutory_role: Peak industry body representing electricity networks (incl. transmission and distribution).
Industry association representing major electricity and gas retailers and generators.
Peak body for Australia’s clean energy industry (renewables and storage).

name_local: Energy and Climate Change Ministerial Council (ECMC)
name_english: Energy and Climate Change Ministerial Council (ECMC)
statutory_role: Intergovernmental ministerial forum coordinating national energy and climate change reforms and oversight of market institutions.

name_english: CSIRO (Commonwealth Scientific and Industrial Research Organisation)
statutory_role: National science agency conducting energy-related research and innovation programs.
notes: Broad multi-sector research body; included as primary national energy R&D institution.

statutory_role: Operates and coordinates Brazil’s National Interconnected System (SIN) dispatch and real-time system operation.
Federal electricity regulator overseeing concessions, tariffs, regulation and supervision of the electricity sector.
National ministry responsible for energy and mining policy, including electricity sector policy direction.

name_local: Câmara de Comercialização de Energia Elétrica (CCEE)
statutory_role: Operates and administers electricity trading/settlement and market commercialization processes.
National energy planning and studies body supporting expansion planning and sector studies.
Federal authority for nuclear safety, safeguards, and regulation of nuclear/radiological activities.

name_local: Associação Brasileira das Empresas de Transmissão de Energia Elétrica (ABRATE)
name_english: Brazilian Association of Electric Power Transmission Companies (ABRATE)
statutory_role: Industry association representing major electricity transmission companies.

name_local: Associação Brasileira de Distribuidores de Energia Elétrica (ABRADEE)
statutory_role: Industry association representing electricity distribution utilities.
notes: Chosen as primary cross-industry association for regulated electricity networks (distribution).

name_local: Associação Brasileira de Energia Solar Fotovoltaica (ABSOLAR)
statutory_role: Industry association representing the solar PV sector in Brazil.
High-level national council advising on energy policy guidelines and priorities.
notes: Council structure and pages can change; website path may vary within MME.

name_local: Centro de Pesquisas de Energia Elétrica (CEPEL)
statutory_role: National electricity-sector R&D institute supporting studies, testing and applied research.

name_local: Centro Nacional de Control de Energía (CENACE)
statutory_role: Operative control of the Sistema Eléctrico Nacional and dispatch; system operator functions.
Federal technical regulator issuing regulations and administrative resolutions and supervising regulated energy activities; successor regulator to CRE.
notes: CRE functions transferred; CNE is sectorized to SENER.

statutory_role: Federal ministry setting national energy policy and sector planning.

name_local: Centro Nacional de Control de Energía (CENACE)
statutory_role: Operates the Mercado Eléctrico Mayorista (wholesale electricity market) and ensures non-discriminatory access to the transmission/distribution networks.
notes: Same institution as TSO; retained due to distinct role.

statutory_role: Leads national power sector planning instruments (e.g., sector development plans) and policy-driven expansion planning.
notes: Planning responsibilities can be shared with other entities; included as primary national planning authority.

name_local: Comisión Nacional de Seguridad Nuclear y Salvaguardias (CNSNS)
name_english: National Commission for Nuclear Safety and Safeguards (CNSNS)
statutory_role: Federal nuclear and radiological safety regulator and safeguards authority.
Industry association representing major power generators; policy and sector engagement.
notes: Primary national electricity-generation industry association; coverage is electricity-focused.

statutory_role: Industry association representing the solar energy value chain in Mexico.

name_local: Instituto Nacional de Electricidad y Energías Limpias (INEEL)
name_english: National Institute of Electricity and Clean Energies (INEEL)
statutory_role: National applied research institute for electricity and clean energy technologies.
National electricity transmission system operator; operates transmission network and system/load dispatch functions.
National energy regulator overseeing electricity market regulation, licensing and supervision.
notes: EPDK is commonly referred to as EMRA in English.

name_local: T.C. Enerji ve Tabii Kaynaklar Bakanlığı
name_english: Republic of Türkiye Ministry of Energy and Natural Resources
statutory_role: National ministry responsible for energy policy, strategy and sector oversight.
Operates organized energy markets (electricity and related markets/exchanges).
Carries out nationwide system operation and related planning/operation functions through central and nationwide units, including load dispatch.
notes: Same institution as TSO; retained due to distinct role.

statutory_role: National authority regulating nuclear energy and ionizing radiation activities; nuclear safety and radiation protection oversight.
Industry association representing electricity producers in Türkiye.
National renewable industry association for wind energy sector.

name_local: Türkiye Enerji, Nükleer ve Maden Araştırma Kurumu (TENMAK)
name_english: Turkish Energy, Nuclear and Mineral Research Agency (TENMAK)
statutory_role: National research agency for energy, nuclear and mining R&D and related programs.
National ministry responsible for industry and trade; leads state management of the power sector and energy policy.
National electricity regulatory authority under MOIT responsible for electricity regulation activities.

name_local: Trung tâm Điều độ Hệ thống điện Quốc gia (EVNNLDC)
statutory_role: National power system dispatch/load dispatch center performing system operation functions.
notes: Often referenced as EVNNLDC (A0); public portal commonly via EVN market site.

name_local: Trung tâm Điều độ Hệ thống điện Quốc gia (EVNNLDC)
statutory_role: Supports operation of competitive electricity market systems and dispatch-related market operations.
notes: Same institution as TSO; retained due to distinct role.

statutory_role: Power-sector state management body under MOIT with functions including power development planning and renewable energy development.

name_local: Cục An toàn bức xạ và hạt nhân (VARANS)
name_english: Vietnam Agency for Radiation and Nuclear Safety (VARANS)
statutory_role: National radiation and nuclear safety authority under MOST.

name_local: Hiệp hội Năng lượng Việt Nam (VEA)
statutory_role: National energy industry association engaging on energy policy and sector coordination.
notes: Primary national association presence; site is hosted on nangluongvietnam.vn.
